events.message: I want to return the headphones I bought last week because they don't work as expected and I would like a full refund.
The system has identified this case as a refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting to return the product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned headphones.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your headphones for a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for returning the headphones so we can process the refund quickly?
The order number is 123456789. The headphones don't connect properly to my phone and have static noise during calls.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a return label via email within 24 hours. Once we receive the headphones, we will issue a full refund promptly.
That sounds perfect, thanks for your help. I'll wait for the return label and send the headphones back.
We have sent the return label to your email and processed your refund once the item is received. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if the return process was satisfactory. Please reach out with any other questions.
Since there has been no further response, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
